title: ===Filming idea for LOL===
body:
I have thought that there are many people who have been filming league of legends and uploading it on YouTube. Which makes most people want to film too so what if there was an option already built into lol twice enables the player to film there game so that they can share with friends or post on YouTube

I got this idea mainly from Minecraft which has an option where any player can live stream there gameplay. It seems like it would be great if it worked on lol.

Please leave a comment or vote if you think this is a good idea
:D
